LanguageData.SuperHeatWave.label: Super heat wave
LanguageData.SuperHeatWave.description: An extreme wave of heat is baking the area.
LanguageData.BoulderMassHit.label: Meteor rain
LanguageData.BoulderMassHit.description: Meteor Rain! Everyone in the shelter
LanguageData.Endlessday.label: Endless day
LanguageData.Endlessday.description: Because of the powerful flash of a star on the planet now is the day. And nothing else.
LanguageData.LeanAtmosphere.label: Lean atmosphere
LanguageData.LeanAtmosphere.description: As a result of the powerful release of a large amount of energy, the atmosphere of the planet is not far from the atmosphere. This will lower the temperature at night and raise during the day. In addition, there will now be an increased background radiation.
LanguageData.RadiationFon.label: Radiation
LanguageData.RadiationFon.description: There is no part of the atmosphere on the planet, which is why the radiation from the stars is stronger.
LanguageData.NoSun.label: No Sun
LanguageData.NoSun.description: There is no star in your star system. Endless night and cold.
LanguageData.DenseAtmosphere.label: Dense atmosphere
LanguageData.DenseAtmosphere.description: The planet is very dense atmosphere, which leads to the greenhouse effect.
LanguageData.IceStorm.label: Ice storm
LanguageData.IceStorm.description: An ice storm overtook you. This storm carries incredible low temperatures and ice fragments. Do not leave the house
LanguageData.HeavyAir.label: Heavy air
LanguageData.HeavyAir.description: Air flows brought a large amount of heavy gases, they make breathing difficult and poison the body, you need to wait a couple of days
LanguageData.HeavyAir.endMessage: It seems the bulk of the heavy elements has been blown away.
LanguageData.SandStorm.label: Sand storm
LanguageData.SandStorm.description: A sandstorm is coming. During this time, will be reduced visibility, speed
LanguageData.ClimateChaos.label: Climate chaos
LanguageData.ClimateChaos.description: Due to the powerful release of energy, a climatic shift has occurred. The constant change of weather and weather disasters.
LanguageData.IonizedAtmosphere.label: Ionized atmosphere
LanguageData.IonizedAtmosphere.description: The ionosphere layer is significantly larger than ever. This increases the chance of thunderstorms.
LanguageData.IonizedAtmosphere.endMessage: The size of the ionosphere has decreased
LanguageData.RimOverhaul_Earthquake.label: Earthquake
LanguageData.RimOverhaul_Earthquake.description: An earthquake began, everyone in the shelter!
LanguageData.Constellations.label: Constellations
LanguageData.Psychogas.label: Psychogas
LanguageData.Psychogas.description: Someone has released tons of mind-altering chemicals into the air, so everyone who is in the open air will lose their sanity.
LanguageData.Psychogas.endMessage: Most of the gases evaporated. Outdoors is safe again.
LanguageData.RimOverhaul_SpaceBattle.label: Space battle
LanguageData.RimOverhaul_SpaceBattle.description: Not far from your planet, two unknown factions staged a space battle. During this time, spaceships and projectiles may collapse on the planet.
LanguageData.HighMutantPopulation.label: High mutant population
LanguageData.HighMutantPopulation.description: The population of mutants has sharply increased on the planet. They do not need prisoners, they only want one thing - to kill. Until the population drops, the risk of mutant attacks is very high.
LanguageData.GlacialPeriod.label: Glacial period
LanguageData.GlacialPeriod.description: The glacial period begins on the planet. Every few days the temperature will drop and the whole planet will turn into a glacier
LanguageData.ActiveStar.label: Active star
LanguageData.ActiveStar.description: The main star in your system is very active, it throws out powerful bursts of energy that cause fever and burns to everyone who is in the open during a burst
